channel.title: Karabiner-Elements Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 14.4.15
item.description:
About v14.4.15 Update

  • üí• Breaking changes
    • The following modifier flags and manipulators are now canceled even for events from devices not grabbed by Karabiner-Elements, e.g. mouse clicks.
      • sticky modifiers
      • to_if_alone
      • to_if_held_down
      • to_delayed_action
  • ‚ö°Ô∏è Improvements
    • Preferences Window is rewritten in SwiftUI.
    • Sparkle Framework has been updated.

More
